sentences: Ta jooksis sajasekundit kiiremini kui teised.
Kui sa ei saa selles sekundit valmis, siis me lähem ilma sinuta.
Nägin teda alles kolm sekundit tagasi.
context: Sekundit is the partitive case form of 'sekundi', which means 'second' in English. It's used when referring to an indefinite quantity or duration less than a full second, similar to how we might say 'a few seconds' or some unspecified amount of time in English.
